## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G18030](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G18030)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>SAUR21</u>
- **Gene Name:** SMALL AUXIN UP RNA 21
- **Description:**   SAUR-like auxin-responsive protein family;(source:Araport11)
